actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Agriculture.

official_title: A bill to amend the Packers and Stockyards Act of 1921, as amended, so as to more adequately cover the egg industry, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Includes the egg industry witin the definition of "packers" under the Packers and Stockyards Act; within the enumeration of unlawful practice under such Act; and within the jurisdiction of the Federal Trade Commission.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Packers and Stockyards Act of 1921, as amended, so as to more adequately cover the egg industry, and for other purposes.
